title: The dispersion generalized Benjamin-Ono equation
abstract:
We consider the well-posedness of the family of dispersion generalized
Benjamin-Ono equations. Earlier work of Herr-Ionescu-Kenig-Koch established
well-posedness with data in $L^2$, by using a discretized gauge transform in
the setting of Bourgain spaces. In this article, we remain in the simpler
functional setting of Sobolev spaces, and instead combine a pseudodifferential
gauge transform, a paradifferential normal form, and a variable coefficient
Strichartz analysis to establish well-posedness in negative-exponent Sobolev
spaces. Our result coincides with the classical well-posedness results obtained
at the Benjamin-Ono and KdV endpoints.
